azurerm_data_lake_analytics_account.description: Manages an Azure Data Lake Analytics Account.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Lake Analytics Account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Has to be between 3 to 24 characters.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Lake Analytics Account.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

default_store_account_name.description: Specifies the data lake store to use by default. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tier.description: The monthly commitment tier for Data Lake Analytics Account. Accepted values are `Consumption`, `Commitment_100000AUHours`, `Commitment_10000AUHours`, `Commitment_1000AUHours`, `Commitment_100AUHours`, `Commitment_500000AUHours`, `Commitment_50000AUHours`, `Commitment_5000AUHours`, or `Commitment_500AUHours`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Data Lake Analytics Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Lake Analytics Account.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Lake Analytics Account.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Lake Analytics Account.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Lake Analytics Account.
